christinablacken: Great thought provoking post. I’m having a hard time with #11 bc from my experience - we all have our traumas issues and inner pain. I took a look through the questions and responses in this thread about #11 and realized another interpretation is just because you don’t love yourself doesn’t mean you aren’t deserving of love or incapable of giving love to someone else. And also that self love is used to victim blame people who love abusers (when the abuser should be held accountable) which I definitely agree with. I just have a hard time seeing how someone lacking love of themselves and actively working on growth and healing can have fulfilling and quality relationships if they aren’t doing those things.
